info.name: Project Reality (realitymod.com) Simplified
info.description: I have simplified the realitymod.com homepage, but I have plans to extend it to other pages as well. Aims to give a much better experience on the site.
info.additionalInfo:
0.01 - WIP - I've removed unnecessary header options and the sidebar, footer, copyright, RSS feed icon, and an unnecessary title and the button to collapse a post. I've removed the border around the contents of everything, and I've changed the font size by one pixel, along with other miscellaneous changes that make for a much more concise, and minimal webpage. This is designed for the homepage as of now, but removes some unnecessary elements on other pages that I will work on. Released July 14th, 2013

TODO for 0.02 - Increase navigation buttons' sizes, Make blog content boxes fill up webpage so that there isn't as much empty space on high resolution devices.
